attributes.action: Support MSP's to veto the UK's exit from the EU
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon has suggested that Holyrood could try the block the UK's exit from the EU by arguing that MSP's could potentially not give legislative consent motions that extricates the UK from the EU. This should be explored as an opportunity to correct what was a flawed referendum.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:


http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
